setup_commands: (command -v mamba >/dev/null 2>&1 && mamba create -p ./env python=3.12 pip numpy pandas -y) || (command -v conda >/dev/null 2>&1 && conda create -p ./env python=3.12 pip numpy pandas -y) || (echo "Warning: Neither mamba nor conda found, creating venv instead" && python3 -m venv ./env && ./env/bin/pip install numpy pandas)
(command -v mamba >/dev/null 2>&1 && mamba install -p ./env -c conda-forge rdkit -y) || ./env/bin/pip install rdkit
(command -v mamba >/dev/null 2>&1 && mamba install -p ./env -c conda-forge biopython -y) || ./env/bin/pip install biopython
